_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The ten universal dimensions of meditati: Meditation on universal earth above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal water above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal fire above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal air above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal blue above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal yellow above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal red above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal white above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal space above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
Meditation on universal consciousness above, below, across, non-dual and limitless
